item.title: 特朗普威胁加征关税，印度期待在秋季最后期限前与美国达成协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周继续威胁征收关税，印度官员也计划继续与美国谈判，以便在今年秋季之前达成双边贸易协议。【原文：Indian officials are planning to continue negotiating with the US for a bilateral trade deal by fall of this year even if US President Donald Trump follows through with threatened tariffs this week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行工资跟踪报告预示明年薪资压力将降温
item.description: 欧元区的工资增长将在明年初大幅放缓，这进一步证明欧洲中央银行已经重新控制住了通货膨胀。【原文：Wage growth in the euro zone is set to slow sharply into the beginning of next year, adding to evidence that the European Central Bank has brought inflation back under control.】

item.title: 恒生银行股价在物业减值飙升后下挫
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司控制的香港贷款机构恒生银行有限公司上半年减值骤增，因为香港商业地产的低迷继续给银行带来痛苦。【原文：Hang Seng Bank Ltd., a Hong Kong lender controlled by HSBC Holdings Plc, posted a jump in impairments in the first half, as the city’s commercial property downturn continues to inflict pain on its banks.】

item.title: Klarna 获得英国金融行为监管局颁发的新许可证
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 表示，其英国分部已获得电子货币机构许可证，这将为这家瑞典金融科技公司与 Revolut Ltd. 和 Monzo Bank Ltd. 等公司更直接地争夺零售银行客户奠定基础。【原文：Klarna Group Plc said it has received an electronic money institution license for its UK division, which could lay the ground work for the Swedish fintech to more directly compete against the likes of Revolut Ltd. and Monzo Bank Ltd. for retail bank customers.】

item.title: 英伟达合作伙伴富士康与台湾德科合作推进人工智能发展
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. formed a strategic alliance with Teco Electric & Machinery Co., a pact that should help the iPhone-assembler advance its push into artificial intelligence hardware.】

item.title: 日产警告称扭亏计划和关税不利因素将导致更多亏损
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）警告称，随着这家陷入困境的汽车制造商推进其代价高昂的扭亏计划，并努力应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对汽车进口征收关税的影响，未来将出现可观的亏损。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. warned of sizable losses ahead as the embattled carmaker pushes forward with its costly turnaround plan and grapples with the fallout of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on car imports.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前财报黯淡，欧洲股市下挫
item.description: 在投资者等待美联储政策决定的同时，欧洲股市也在一系列令人失望的财报之后下滑。【原文：European stocks slid following a flurry of disappointing earnings, while investors awaited the Federal Reserve’s policy decision.】

item.title: 据称意大利支持依维柯解体，向塔塔和莱昂纳多出售产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利政府广泛支持依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）将其防务部门出售给莱昂纳多股份公司（Leonardo SpA）以及将其商用卡车部门出售给印度塔塔汽车有限公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）的业务分拆计划。【原文：The Italian government is broadly supportive of Iveco Group NV’s plans to break up its business by selling its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and its commercial trucking division to India’s Tata Motors Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 支持的公司收购海湾资本的中东生育业务
item.description: KKR & Co.支持的一家公司收购了海湾资本公司（Gulf Capital PJSC）在其中东生育业务中的股份，凸显了该地区对特殊医疗服务日益增长的需求。【原文：A firm backed by KKR & Co. has bought Gulf Capital PJSC’s stake in its Middle Eastern fertility business, underscoring the rising demand for specialty medical services in the region.】

item.title: 泰勒-温佩公司的规定表明英国消防安全问题的解决任重道远
item.description: 格伦费尔大火夺走了 72 条人命，在这场悲剧发生八年多之后，英国的房屋建筑商仍在努力消除多年来不安全的建筑做法所带来的长期影响。【原文：More than eight-years on from the tragic Grenfell fire that claimed 72-lives, the UK’s home builders are still grappling with the long fall out from clearing up years of unsafe building practices.】

item.title: 欧拉电器就潜在高收益债务融资举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度电动汽车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd 的股价今年下跌了约 50%，该公司最近与贷款方举行了会谈，探讨通过高收益债务筹集资金。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd, an Indian electric vehicle maker whose shares have fallen about 50% this year, recently held talks with lenders to explore raising money through high-yield debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 施耐德电气将以 55 亿欧元全资收购印度合资公司
item.description: 施耐德电气（SE）同意从淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）手中收购其印度合资企业剩余的 35% 股份，这有助于加强其在南亚国家的业务。【原文：Schneider Electric SE agreed to acquire the remaining 35% stake in its India joint venture from Temasek Holdings Pte, helping to step up its presence in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 法国隆巴德称美国贸易协议为企业提供了知名度
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德说，即使关税是一个 "双输 "局面，欧盟与美国的贸易协议也为企业提供了投资所需的能见度。【原文：French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said European Union’s trade deal with the US gives companies the visibility needed to invest even if the tariffs are a “lose-lose” situation.】

item.title: 经济疲软影响前景，匈牙利避免衰退
item.description: 匈牙利经济在第二季度勉强实现了经济增长，避免了经济衰退，但也凸显了总理维克托-欧尔班在明年大选前面临的挑战。【原文：Hungary’s economy eked out economic growth in the second quarter, averting a recession but underscoring Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s challenge before next year’s elections.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易摩擦冲击大型矿商，力拓利润下滑
item.description: 力拓集团公布上半年利润下降，原因是全球最大的矿业公司正与关键大宗商品价格停滞不前作斗争，而唐纳德-特朗普总统引发的贸易不确定性威胁着需求。【原文：Rio Tinto Group posted a decline in first-half profit as the world’s biggest miners battle stagnant prices for key commodities, and trade uncertainties unleashed by President Donald Trump threaten demand.】

item.title: 到 2026 年底，Glencore 将削减 10 亿美元业务成本
item.description: 嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）表示，为应对大宗商品价格下降带来的压力和唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战对经济的影响，该公司将在 2026 年底前从业务中剥离 10 亿美元的成本。【原文：Glencore Plc said it will take $1 billion of costs out of the business by the end of 2026, as the company responds to pressures from lower commodity prices and the economic impacts of President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 亚洲能源转型计划推动马来西亚交易所首次公开募股
item.description: 马来西亚证券交易所的最高官员表示，随着亚洲摆脱化石燃料的依赖，为能源转型项目寻求资金的公司有望推动马来西亚的首次公开募股。【原文：Malaysia’s pipeline of initial public offerings is expected to get a boost from firms seeking capital for energy transition projects as Asia weans itself off fossil fuels, according to the top official at the local bourse.】

item.title: Brevan Star Trader 的宏观基金上半年收益近 10
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management LLP）的明星投资组合经理米纳尔-巴斯瓦尔（Minal Bathwal）带领其价值数十亿美元的对冲基金在上半年取得了近 10% 的收益。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management LLP star portfolio manager Minal Bathwal steered his multibillion dollar hedge fund to a nearly 10% gain in the first half, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望维持在纪录附近
尽管存在贸易疑虑，法国经济仍意外加速增长
item.description: 由于库存增加抵消了国内需求的疲软和贸易的拖累，法国经济增长在第二季度意外加速。【原文：French economic growth unexpectedly accelerated in the second quarter as inventory building offset weak domestic demand and a drag from trade.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行季度业绩创纪录后将回购 17 亿欧元股票
item.description: 西班牙最大的银行桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）公布了创纪录的第二季度利润，并宣布了一项新的回购计划，兑现了两年内至少回购 100 亿欧元（116 亿美元）股票的承诺。【原文：Banco Santander SA posted a record second-quarter profit and announced a new buyback as Spain’s largest bank makes good on a pledge to repurchase at least €10 billion ($11.6 billion) worth of stock over two years.】

item.title: 瑞银集团第二季度利润超出预期，前景一片光明
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）公布的第二季度利润高于预期，并表示随着投资者活动的复苏，全球贸易紧张局势降温的前景将对业绩起到支撑作用。【原文：UBS Group AG posted higher than expected profit in the second quarter, and signaled that the prospect of cooling global trade tensions should support results as investor activity revives.】

item.title: 简街希望六周内对印度做出回应，但时间可能更短
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，简街集团有限责任公司（Jane Street Group LLC）已向印度证券监管机构申请再延长六周时间，以准备针对市场操纵指控的辩护，但可能获得的时间会更短。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC has sought six more weeks from India’s securities regulator to prepare its defense against market manipulation allegations, though it may get fewer, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯围绕克里姆林宫钦点的超级应用程序构建新网络
item.description:
政府正在协调努力，打击外国技术服务，并建立由政府控制的国内选择。【原文：

A coordinated effort is underway to crack down on foreign tech services and build up domestic options controlled by the government.

】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯和穆罕默德-苏丹广播公司远未摆脱对石油的依赖
item.description: 大约十年前，沙特阿拉伯现任王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）曾表示，到 2020 年，沙特阿拉伯王国的经济将能够在没有石油的情况下生存，他将这一说法与旨在引导国家进入新时代的巨额投资联系在一起。如今，关键指标显示，沙特政府对石油美元的依赖程度依然如故，甚至有过之而无不及。【原文：Around a decade ago, Saudi Arabia’s now Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman said the kingdom’s economy would be able to survive without oil by 2020, a claim he linked to huge investments aimed at steering the country into a new era. Today, key indicators show the government remains just as reliant on petrodollars, if not more so.】

item.title: 特斯拉与 LG Energy 签订价值 43 亿美元的电池供应合同
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司已经签署了一项价值 43 亿美元的协议，从 LG Energy Solution Ltd. 公司采购磷酸铁锂电池，这是这家电动汽车制造商本月在韩国的第二次合作。【原文：Tesla Inc. has signed a $4.3 billion agreement to source lithium iron phosphate, or LFP, batteries from LG Energy Solution Ltd., a person familiar with the matter said, in the second tie-up for the EV maker in South Korea this month.】

item.title: 据称信实将在 Jio IPO 中寻求小规模浮动，筹资 60 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）正在提议出售其 Jio 电信部门仅 5%的股份，这次潜在的上市可能会融资 60 多亿美元。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. is proposing to sell just 5% of its Jio telecommunications unit in a potential listing that may raise more than $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普利用贸易威胁在中国后院充当和事佬
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对泰国和柬埔寨发出关税威胁，促使两国本周结束了致命的边境冲突，再次表明他愿意利用贸易战这把大棒来阻止武装冲突，并在中国的后院给中国一记重拳。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff threats against Thailand and Cambodia pushed them toward ending their deadly border clash this week, showing again his willingness to use a trade war cudgel to stop armed conflict and upstaging China in its own backyard.】

item.title: 分析师称特朗普的 "餐巾纸 "贸易协议令东南亚担忧
item.description: 一位重要的政策观察家表示，由于迄今达成的协议缺乏确定的细节或承诺，各国和企业需要继续做好准备，应对下月贸易协议截止日期之后美国关税带来的挑战性影响。【原文：Nations and businesses need to remain prepared for challenging impacts from US tariffs after next month’s deadline for trade deals, as agreements struck so far are short on firm details or commitments, according to a key policy watcher.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收 20-25% 关税后，印度市场将面临颠簸
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
